dict.string:
#!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh"
# JavaScript keyword and function index created from MDN documentation reference # https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference
ref=$(zgrep -w "${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-$TM_CURRENT_WORD}" "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/mdn-reference.gz"|cut -d ' ' -f2)
[[ -n "$ref" ]] && exit_show_html "<meta http-equiv='Refresh' content='0;URL=http://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs$ref'>"
echo "No documentation found."
